document.docAuthor: Stekolshchikov, Andrey V. & Buga, Sergey V.
document.masterDocTitle: The aphid fauna (Hemiptera, Sternorrhyncha, Aphidomorpha) of Murmansk province (Russia), with description of Aphis khrulevi sp. nov. and Dysaphis karyakini sp. nov. and males of Chaitophorus nigricantis Pintera, 1987

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: The aphid fauna (Hemiptera, Sternorrhyncha, Aphidomorpha) of Murmansk province (Russia), with description of Aphis khrulevi sp. nov. and Dysaphis karyakini sp. nov. and males of Chaitophorus nigricantis Pintera, 1987

Published information. Pol , Mur and Kir :
Betula
sp. ( Mordvilko, 1935 ) and Khi :
Betula
sp. ( Fridolin, 1936 ). However, review of microscope slides stored in the collection of ZIN RAS reveals that specimens collected in the 1930s by A.K. Mordvilko and V.Yu. Fridolin are
E. punctipennis
. Since we do not know whether all the samples collected by them are stored in the collections of ZIN RAS, it is impossible to say whether they had
E. punctipennis
only, or both
Euceraphis
species. MP :
Betula pubescens
and
Betula pendula ( Stekolshchikov & Kozlov, 2012 )
.

Material. 20SMon :
Betula pubescens
,
9.vii.1998
, al. ( SB )
. 41SMon :
Betula pubescens ,
14.vii.1998
, al. ( SB )
. Luv :
Alnus incana
(accidentally), 11.vii.2003 , al.;
Salix phylicifolia
L. (accidentally), 6.vii.2005 , al.; light trap, 30.vii– 4.viii.2003 , 1–15.vii.2004 , 16–18.vi.2005 and 30.v–10.vii.2005 , al. (ESh). 10NMon :
Betula pendula
, 21.viii.2008 , 27.vi.2010 and 29.vii.2010 , al.;
Betula pubescens
,
27.vi.2010
, al. ( MK )
. 12NWZ :
Betula pendula
, 24.viii.2008 , 23.vi.2010 and 1.viii.2010 , al.;
Betula pubescens
,
23.vi.2010
, al. ( MK )
.

Published information. MP : without host plant ( Shaposhnikov, 1964 ) and
Betula
sp. ( Vershinina, 1975 ) (the aphids were identified using keys that did not differentiate between
Euceraphis punctipennis
and
Euceraphis betulae
, so the recorded samples may belong to either or both species);
Betula pubescens
and
Betula pendula ( Stekolshchikov & Kozlov, 2012 )
. PABG :
Betula pubescens ( Buga, 1999 )
. LRP and LRCh :
Betula
sp. (Stekolshchikov, 2012). See also “Published information“ on
Euceraphis betulae (Koch, 1855)
.
